title: HB Wallet
author: HB Wallet
content: Oasis is a Proof of Stake (POS) Layer 1 Blockchain focuses on privacy and scalability.It’s EVM compatible with two main architectural components that include Consensus Layer and the ParaTime Layer.This structure allows Oasis to support the whole Solidity toolchain, but with enhanced performance and significant lower gas fees in comparison to Ethereum.ROSE actually plays the major role in securing the network.It’s in fact the heart and soul of the whole network since all activities require ROSE from gas payment, staking, delegation to hosting ParaTime.Learn more in our article about ROSE Crypto
